vehicles.description: A large commercial vehicle on the right side of the image, possibly a truck or trailer, partially obscured due to the camera angle, with visible tail lights indicating it may be in motion or stopped
vehicles.explanation: The position and potential movement of the truck is crucial for determining safe lane usage and maintaining an adequate following distance.

other objects.description: Reflections and glare visible on the image, possibly due to oncoming vehicles or street lights, affecting visibility
other objects.explanation: Glare can obscure vision and lead to difficulty in detecting road users and traffic signals, requiring heightened attention.

suggestions: Given these conditions, the ego car should maintain a safe distance from the commercial vehicle to the right and be prepared for it to either merge or extend further into the lane. Additionally, the ego car should adjust its speed according to the flow of the vehicles ahead, while being cautious of the road conditions that may affect braking distances. No urgent maneuvers are indicated, but constant vigilance is necessary due to the large vehicle's proximity and the conditions of the road surface. If visibility is poor, the use of headlights and ensuring clear windshields will be important for safe travel.
